item.description:
UPDATE 8/2:   Ive uploaded a file for this event. If interested, it's an invitation to Sigrid Olsen -Isla Beach House Party on Rocky Neck Avenue - this file also includes a coupon if there's something you may wish to buy. To access it- go to top of meetup page, click on MORE, then FILES

 

From June to September, celebrate Nights on the Neck on the first Thursday of the month from 5:30 to 9pm. Many galleries host receptions with refreshments. Musicians, dancers, authors, historians and other entertainers give performances and lectures.

I've done this several times, and it's always been a great night out. We can walk the neck, visit the open galleries, listen to music, and end up at one of the restaurants for drinks & / food. This is a combined event with other meetup groups.

*WE WILL MEETUP @ 5pm at The Rocky Neck Art Colony sign- the sign is at the public lot at the base of Rocky Neck Avenue- there are maps and brochures there. If you are unable to join us at 5, join us when you can. My contact # is: 978.289.7679. This is a mostly outdoor event - therefore, weather dependent. Please make sure to check for an update if weather is questionable.

**You can find the schedule  and all info at: www.rockyneckartcolony.org

The  8/2 schedule of events kicks off at 5pm with The Adventure Chantey Singers- across from the public parking lot.... and ends with Jazz from 8:45 - 9:45 at the Center on Wonson St.  www. rockyneckartcolony.org
item.how_to_find_us: please read description for where to meetup
item.name: Nights on the Neck - Gloucester - multi-group night out at Rocky Neck Art Colony
